author: amyroh
msg: Add an optional '%S' item for logging user session id in the access log.
This will allow to better tracking the activities of a single user session.
The purpose is to be able to collect requests that belong to the same session.
Relates to Bug #4247, thanks for the enhancement idea from tal@zapta.com (Tal Dayan).

author: remm
msg: - Port back additional tweaks for potential thread safety problems.

author: bip
msg: Additional SSI tests, should fail for now until a problem with SSI has
been resolved. This test exploits that bug.

msg: - Also display the flags for the admin webapp build.
